entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Android] Geolocation IsListeningForeground property is always false #21439
  • Removing TapGestureRecognizer with at least 2 taps causes Exception #21437
  • Compile-time binding of BindingContext should use the inherited x:DataType #21434
  • Invoking the PropertyChanged event throws NullReferenceException #21431
  • Image with AspectFill resizes the container it is in #21420
  • Page content not showing when navigation happens in background #21419
  • Mac Catalyst bindable properties not updating after being set #21417

Closed

  • iOS `Entry` Control Ignores `TextColor` Property Upon Binding Update #21430
  • Behavior<Layout<View>> causes InvalidOperationException: "bindable not an instance of AssociatedType" #21376
  • Span TapGesture on Label FormattedString #21284
  • Caught exception in StartHotReloadAsync at 186: System.ArgumentNullException: Value cannot be null. (Parameter 'path1') #19699
  • How do i fix this? Everytime i try to run mij code in vs it gives me a error #19217
  • C# Hot reload not working for Android #18053
  • Visual Studio 2022 not installing MAUI properly, cannot find MAUI workload, project unloaded #15100
  • Restore failures - change version, delete bin/obj, reload #19339
  • Hot Reload not working #19631
  • [Question] How to automatically fill android version info from AssemblyVersion #21426
  • iOS Publishing uses project name and ignores bundle identifier #21365
  • [BUG] Content of a ContentPage doesn't occupy full height when page is pushed to PrismNavigationPage #20418
  • CollectionView - Lost focus for Header when new ItemSource assigned #17845
  • Maui -Android certificate pinning is not kicking in.. but works in ios #21396
  • PropertyChanged event not picked up for bound indexed property in Release mode with Compiled Bindings #21181
    Backlog
  • The privacy report function of iOS is required. #21415
  • system.Diagnostics.Metrics doesn't add my counter in the instrument in case of dotnet MAUI applicaiton when running android emulator using OpenTelemetry #21165
  • Compatibility AbsoluteLayout is broken on Android #20262
  • Random crash in Maui involving get_StrokeDashPattern #21225
  • [Android] The measure and arrange methods are not being called in custom layout with ContentView #19471
  • [.NET MAUI] [BUG] UI doesn't "always" update inside BottomSheetDialogFragment. #19291
  • Flyout menu overlaps with title bar since .Net8 #21127

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix for WebView Error when changing page with WebView loading a page #21436
    area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [android] Add null check to help with #21393 #21432
  • [Xaml] Simplify loading ResourceDictionary from Source #21429
  • Setup scaffolding for legacy test runner #21423
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [iOS] Avoid hang or crash loading CollectionView with thousands of elements #21422
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃

Merged

  • Add install mono step to macOS setup guide #21433
    community ✨
  • [net9.0] Update versions #21373
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [X] Only show x:DataType warnings when using NativeAOT #21418
  • [X] Improve warnings when binding cannot be compiled #21281
  • [X] Fix PropertyChanged on idx for compiledbindings #21366
    area/Xaml </>

Updated

  • [Android] Fixed border inside frame not rendering #20974
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-border
  • [Android] Fixed box view properties #21322
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • [Docs] Update Shell inline comments #20912
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [android] avoid `OnLayout()` for `Label` #21291
    platform/android 🤖, area/perf 🏎️
  • [iOS] Use updated APIs for the button with images #20953
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [Docs] Added pending inline comments to Page class #20933
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net9.0] [testing] Enable Windows UITests back #20727
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Re-Enable CA1416 #20477
  • Fixed entry text color [iOS] #20100
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-entry
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9 #21392
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Fix display of ActionSheet in modal view on Windows #21295
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert
  • [XamlC] Avoid calling ResourceDictionary.SetAndLoadSource #20776
    area/Xaml </>, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [macOS] Fix crash when setting window properties #21357
    platform/macOS 🍏, community ✨, control-window
  • [Android] Ecosystem updates WAS:Google Maps bump/update #20783
    platform/android 🤖, area/Maps🗺
  • [Android] Fix Ripple effect with custom background (alternative to #17821) #20412
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Still measure children if size is known on CV #21409
    area/collectionview 📃
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
